item.title: Black Box System Theory
item.description: A framework for understanding and interacting with complex systems when internal mechanisms are unknown or irrelevant.

item.title: Block Universe Theory (Eternalism)
item.description: Understanding time as a four-dimensional structure where past, present, and future all exist simultaneously.

item.title: Chaos System Management Methods
item.description: Strategies for managing chaotic systems by reducing entropy and establishing sustainable feedback loops.

item.title: DGX Spark Development Cookbook
item.description: Comprehensive guide for setting up and developing on NVIDIA DGX Spark with ARM64 architecture.

item.title: Dimensional Decomposition Process
item.description: A systematic approach to breaking down complex tasks from high-dimensional chaos to executable actions.

item.title: Life Types Comparison: Carbon-Based, Digital, and Information Life
item.description: Exploring the essential differences between carbon-based life, digital life, and theoretical information-based life forms.

item.title: Boundary Project Tech Stack
item.description: Technical architecture and implementation details of the Boundary AI-driven mental health game.

item.title: AI API Integration for Game NPCs
item.description: Integrating large language model APIs for intelligent NPC dialogue in games.

item.description: Creating cross-platform desktop applications using Electron with Next.js static export.

item.description: Creating smooth, declarative animations in React game interfaces using Framer Motion.

item.description: Using Next.js App Router for full-stack game development with static export and API routes.

item.title: React Fundamentals for Game UI
item.description: Core React concepts applied to building game interfaces - components, state, hooks, and more.

item.title: My Embodied AI Development Journey
item.description: A chronicle of building intelligent NPCs in Unity, from heuristic hacks to vision-language models.
